verses.verse: Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib, <S%H24><s%> and keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

You shall therefore sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd, <S%H1241><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread with it; seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread therewith, <S%H5921><s%> even the bread <S%H3899><s%> of affliction; <S%H6040><s%> for you came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in haste: <S%H2649><s%> that you may remember <S%H2142><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when you came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%>

And there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> leavened <S%H7603><s%> bread seen <S%H7200><s%> with you in all <S%H3605><s%> your coast <S%H1366><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there any thing of the flesh, <S%H1320><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> all <S%H3885><s%> night until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

You may <S%H3201><s%> not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> within any <S%H259><s%> of your gates, <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you:

But at <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in, there <S%H8033><s%> you shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> at the going <S%H935><s%> down <S%H935><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> at the season <S%H4150><s%> that you came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And you shall roast <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%> and you shall turn <S%H6437><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to your tents. <S%H168><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread: and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a solemn <S%H6116><s%> assembly <S%H6116><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> shall you number <S%H5608><s%> to you: begin <S%H2490><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> from such time as you begin <S%H2490><s%> to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the corn. <S%H7054><s%>

And you shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> according as the LORD your God has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you:

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you, and your son, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and your manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> and the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> and the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> that are among <S%H7130><s%> you, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were <S%H1961><s%> a slave <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes. <S%H2706><s%>

You shall observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> after that you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in your corn <S%H1637><s%> and your wine: <S%H3342><s%>

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your feast, <S%H2282><s%> you, and your son, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and your manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> and the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> that are within your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you keep <S%H2287><s%> a solemn <S%H2287><s%> feast <S%H2287><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your increase, <S%H8393><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands, <S%H3027><s%> therefore you shall surely <S%H389><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> your males <S%H2138><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall choose; <S%H977><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks, <S%H7620><s%> and in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles: <S%H5521><s%> and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H854><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> empty: <S%H7387><s%>

Every man <S%H376><s%> shall give as he is able, <S%H4979><s%> <S%H3027><s%> according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

Judges <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> shall you make <S%H5414><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your gates, <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, throughout your tribes: <S%H7626><s%> and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with just <S%H6664><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

You shall not wrest <S%H5186><s%> judgment; <S%H4941><s%> you shall not respect <S%H5234><s%> persons, <S%H6440><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a gift: <S%H7810><s%> for a gift <S%H7810><s%> does blind <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> and pervert <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

That which is altogether just <S%H6664><s%> shall you follow, <S%H7291><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.

You shall not plant <S%H5193><s%> you a grove <S%H842><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> near <S%H681><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> you.
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you set <S%H6965><s%> you up any image; <S%H4676><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hates. <S%H8130><s%>
